sections.purpose: To gently or vigorously shake microplates for ELISA, cell culture, or mixing.
sections.scope: Applicable to microplate-based assays in Microbiology.
procedure: Place the microplate on the shaker platform and secure if clamps are provided.
Set the required speed and shaking time.
Start the shaker and observe to ensure plates do not move out of position.
At the end of the cycle, stop the shaker before removing plates.
Wipe the platform with disinfectant after use.
precautions: Do not exceed the maximum load or speed of the shaker.
Ensure plate lids or seals are properly in place to prevent spillage.
Place the shaker on a stable, level surface.
Avoid splashes that could contaminate the platform or surroundings.
Disconnect from power before performing maintenance.
